description.value:
This profile either represents a pathogen identified or, using a code from the NHSN Pathogens Code value set, records that no pathogens were identified.
The value set table provides codes for several unspecified speciesfor example "Acidaminococcus species" (SNOMED CT 131202007, NHSN ACISP)for use when a more precise code is not available. The code for an unspecified species is preferred to a genus-level code.
Each Pathogen Identified profile represents a set of information concerning a single pathogen identified. The profile contains two component elements that record the pathogen and its rank in regard to the other pathogens identified, and can contain additional component elements recording drug-susceptibility test findings. For pathogen antibiogram reporting requirements, refer to the NHSN protocol and the Information Data Model (IDM).

definition.value: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code="41852-5" Microorganism identified (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:3347-103).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value[x], where value[x] is (CONF:3347-101)
valueCodeableConcept, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet NHSNPathogenCode http://hl7.org/fhir/us/hai/ValueSet/nhsn-pathogen-code (CONF:3347-104)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component (CONF:3347-132) such that it

label.value: Pathogen Ranking: the relative importance of a pathogen with respect to its role in the infection

short.value: Pathogen Ranking: the relative importance of a pathogen with respect to its role in the infection

definition.value: SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:3347-115) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code="TEMP_LOINC_PATHOGEN_RANKING" Pathogen Ranking (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 STATIC) (CONF:3347-118).

label.value: First, second or third; where first represents the highest-ranked pathogen of up to three pathogens recorded

short.value: First, second or third; where first represents the highest-ranked pathogen of up to three pathogens recorded

definition.value: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] value[x], where value[x] is (CONF:3347-131)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] valueCodeableConcept, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet NHSNPathogenRanking http://hl7.org/fhir/us/hai/ValueSet/nhsn-pathogen-ranking (CONF:3347-133).

label.value: Drug-Susceptibility Test: uses two codes: one to identify the drug and the other to record the pathogen�s susceptibility to it

short.value: Drug-Susceptibility Test: uses two codes: one to identify the drug and the other to record the pathogen�s susceptibility to it

definition.value: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component (CONF:3347-132) such that it

label.value: A LOINC code represents a methodless isolate drug-susceptibility test

short.value: A LOINC code represents a methodless isolate drug-susceptibility test

definition.value: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet NHSNDrugSusceptibilityTestsCode http://hl7.org/fhir/us/hai/ValueSet/nhsn-drug-susceptibility-tests-code (CONF:3347-134).

label.value: An HL7 ObservationInterpretation code represents the susceptibility finding

short.value: An HL7 ObservationInterpretation code represents the susceptibility finding

definition.value: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] interpretation (ValueSet: NHSNDrugSusceptibilityFindingCode http://hl7.org/fhir/us/hai/ValueSet/nhsn-drug-susceptibility-finding-code) (CONF:3347-135).
